entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lytton 08:18 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.8°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: SSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 700 metres rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023
